testcase.name: Does not show the task list if there are no tasks
Does not show the footer if there are no tasks
On page load, it sets focus on the input field
When I add a task, it shows todo items
Marks a todo item as completed by striking through it
Shows how many items there are left
Does not add empty or blank tasks
